data.scheme_name: Scheme for Awards to MSMEs - Separate Awards for Micro, Small and Medium category
data.benefits: Scheme provide Award Rs 2 lakhs, trophy and appreciation letter to each winner.
data.eligibility:
• Manufacturing MSME who are producing continuously for the last three years are eligible under this scheme. 
  • Manufacturing MSME must have all necessary approvals and licenses that apply.
data.conditions:
Separate award shall be given for Micro, Small and Medium Category. Three award shall be awarded in each category. Basis for award are- 

(i) Growth in production and profit 

(ii) Quality and environment improvement measures 

(iii) Innovation in technology for new product or process development
data.beneficiaries:
Manufacturing MSME who are producing continuously for the last three years are eligible under this scheme.
Manufacturing MSME must have all necessary approvals and licenses that apply.
data.prerequisites:
Separate award shall be given for Micro, Small and Medium Category. Three award shall be awarded in each category. Basis for award are- 

(i) Growth in production and profit 

(ii) Quality and environment improvement measures 

(iii) Innovation in technology for new product or process development
data.nodal_agency: Government of Gujarat Industries and Mines Department
data.context:
• This scheme is a part of the Gujarat Industrial Policy 2020. 
  • This scheme is designed to recognize and reward Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises (MSMEs) that have been in continuous production for 3 years and have valid statutory clearances and licenses.
data.objective:
The scheme aims to recognize and reward MSMEs that have shown excellence in areas such as productivity, quality, providing employment, innovation, product development, and more. 
This recognition is expected to inspire other MSMEs to strive for similar achievements, thereby fostering a culture of excellence and competitiveness among the MSMEs in Gujarat.
data.description: Scheme provide Award Rs 2 lakhs, trophy and appreciation letter to each winner.
data.how_to_apply:
Applicant have to fill the below mentioned form and submit to the MSME Commissioner:
For growth in production and profit -  https://ic.gujarat.gov.in/documents/commondoc/2021/1_GPP-2018-19AND19-20.pdf
For quality and environment improvement measures - https://ic.gujarat.gov.in/documents/commondoc/2021/2_QEIM_2018 - 19_AND_19 - 20.pdf
For innovation in technology for new product or process development - https://ic.gujarat.gov.in/documents/commondoc/2021/3_IT_2018 - 19_AND_19 - 20.pdf
data.funding_mechanism: Fund/Incentive will be released on approval of application by the concerned authority.
data.additional_info:
The prescribed application form will be placed on website by end of August/September every year.
Application should be submitted in duplicate with all enclosures.
data.checklist_info_a:
1. Copy of EM Part-II/ Udyog Aadhar Memorandum
2. Copy of Constitution of Enterprise
3. CA Certified Details of Annual Production Capacity, Investment, Production, Sale, Export-Profit & Employment of last three years
4. Copy of valid GPCB Consent or circular if measures are not applicable
5. Details of Adequate Safety Measures
6. Details of Energy/Water Conservation Measures and its impact
7. CA Certified Audited Annual Account financial statements (Balance Sheet & Profit & Loss Account of last three years)
8. Details of State/National Level Awards received earlier
9. Details of Important Achievements
10. Justification/Write-up (for why the Unit Should be Awarded)
11. Details of Educational Qualifications of Proprietor/All Partners/All Directors
12. Details of Employee Welfare measures implemented in the Enterprise
13. Details of Steps taken for Modernization of the Enterprise
14. Details of Use & Choice of Technology (Indigenous/Imported/Conventional)
15. Details if First-Generation Entrepreneur
16. Details of Services Rendered to Local and Overseas
17. Details of Quality Marks (BIS/ISO etc.)
18. Certificate of SC/ST status of Entrepreneur (if applicable)
data.checklist_info_c:
Applicant have to fill the below mentioned form and submit to the MSME Commissioner-
Application Form for Growth in Production & Profit: https://ic.gujarat.gov.in/documents/commondoc/2021/5_Regional_Award_2018-19_AND_19-20.pdf
Application Form for Quality and Environment Improvement Measures: https://ic.gujarat.gov.in/documents/commondoc/2021/2_QEIM_2018-19_AND_19-20.pdf
Application Form for Innovation in Technology for New Product or Process Development: https://ic.gujarat.gov.in/documents/commondoc/2021/3_IT_2018-19_AND_19-20.pdf
data.checklist_info_d:
Address : Industries Commissionerate Block 1, 2nd Floor, Udyog Bhavan, Sector 11, Gandhinagar-382011, Gujarat
E-Mail ID : icifc@gujarat.gov.in
Phone No : 079-232-40889 / 1800 233 1847
data.beneficiary: Manufacturing Industries - All Entities - Gujarat - All MSMEs
data.lifecycle: Establishment of brand and enhance quality output
